document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph:

Biology. Forests, meadows, bushlands, steppes. Adults occur in II–VII. On Apiaceae :
Daucus
sp.,
Peucedanum
sp.,
Anthriscus
sp.,
Libanotis
sp. Larva feeds in roots, adults on leaves (Smreczyński 1968;
Nazarenko et al . 1998c
)
